item.title: 瑞士钟表出口因中国需求疲软和美国关税而大幅下滑
item.description: 由于中国需求持续疲软，加上美国开始征收严厉的关税，8 月份瑞士钟表出口大幅下滑。【原文：Swiss watch exports tumbled in August as Chinese demand remained weak and stiff US tariffs went into effect.】

item.title: 美联储被认为不那么鸽派，美元创两周最大涨幅
item.description: 由于投资者对美联储政策前景的解读没有早先预想的那么鸽派，美元兑所有主要货币走强。【原文：The dollar strengthened against all of its major peers as investors interpreted the Federal Reserve’s policy outlook as being less dovish than earlier envisaged.】

item.title: 据说紫金黄金香港首次公开募股将吸引 GIC、千禧集团作为投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新加坡政府投资私人有限公司（GIC Pte）、千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management LLC）和希尔豪斯投资公司（Hillhouse Investment）等重量级投资机构将投资紫金黄金国际股份有限公司在香港的首次公开募股。【原文：GIC Pte, Millennium Management LLC and Hillhouse Investment are among heavyweights that are set to invest in Zijin Gold International Co.’s initial public offering in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国经济增长 "疲软"，Next 预计销售放缓
item.description: Next Plc 警告称，下半年销售将放缓，因为该零售商预测，由于监管加强、税收增加、政府支出和就业机会减少，未来几年英国经济将出现增长乏力。【原文：Next Plc warned that sales will slow in the second half as the retailer forecast that the UK economy is set for anemic growth in the coming years from increased regulation, higher taxes, government spending and declining job opportunities..】

item.title: 埃克尼提称泰国新政府正在酝酿稳定泰铢的措施
item.description: 泰国总理阿努丁-占维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）的新政府正在与中央银行就稳定泰铢的措施进行谈判，此前泰铢汇率已升至四年来的高点，引发了要求紧急干预以保护出口和旅游业的呼声。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s incoming administration is in talks with the central bank on measures to stabilize the baht, after the currency’s rally to a four-year high sparked calls for urgent intervention to protect exports and tourism.】

item.title: 泰国零售商因计划出售意大利业务而股价大跌
item.description: 中央零售集团公司（Central Retail Corporation Pcl）宣布计划出售其在意大利的高端百货公司业务 Rinascente，投资者预计此举将损害公司业绩，之后该公司股价创下近五年来的最大跌幅。【原文：Central Retail Corporation Pcl’s shares headed for the biggest decline in almost five years after it announced a plan to sell its high-end department store business Rinascente in Italy, a move that investors expect will hurt the bottom line.】

item.title: 39%关税实施首月瑞士对美出口下滑
item.description: 自 39% 的关税生效以来的首次数据显示，美国对发达国家征收的最高关税对瑞士的出口造成了沉重打击。【原文：The highest US tariff among developed nations dealt a severe blow to Swiss exports, according to the first reading since the 39% levy took effect.】

item.title: Gymshark 的支持者 General Atlantic 将扩大英国办事处的规模
item.description: 以早期押注 Facebook 和优步（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：General Atlantic, known for its early bets on companies like Facebook and Uber Technologies Inc., is expanding its London office footprint after boosting its headcount in the city to nearly 200 employees.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国央行会议前英镑跌至 1.36 美元
罗氏将以 35 亿美元收购生物制药公司 89bio
item.description: 罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）表示，它将收购生物制药公司 89bio, Inc.【原文：Roche Holding AG said it will acquire biopharmaceutical company 89bio, Inc. in a deal valued at $3.5 billion, bolstering the Swiss pharmaceutical giant’s pipeline of cardiovascular, renal, and metabolic disease treatments.】

item.title: 日本自民党林贤治的目标是实现持续 1%的实际工资增长
item.description: 日本政府最高发言人林芳正发誓要确保实际工资以大约 1% 的速度持续增长，这是他希望能帮助自己赢得执政党领导人竞选的政策纲领的一部分。【原文：Japan’s top government spokesman Yoshimasa Hayashi vowed to ensure that real wages grow at a sustained pace of about 1% as part of a policy platform that he hopes will help him win the ruling party’s leadership race.】

item.title: 反同性恋法限制外国借贷，乌干达内债飙升
item.description: 在严格的反男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者的法律限制了这个东非国家从国外获得低成本资金之后，乌干达对国内债务的依赖急剧膨胀。【原文：Uganda’s reliance on domestic debt ballooned after stringent anti-LGBTQI laws restricted the East African nation’s access to low-cost funding from abroad.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称中国在贸易谈判期间放弃对谷歌的反垄断调查
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引知情人士的话报道称，中国已决定结束对谷歌公司的安卓系统在全球最大智能手机领域占据主导地位的反垄断调查。【原文：China has decided to end an antitrust investigation into the dominance of Google’s Android in the world’s largest smartphone arena, the Financial Times reported, citing people briefed on the move.】

item.title: 台湾承诺购买美国小麦后小麦期货走高
item.description: 在签署了一份意向书之后，小麦期货从上一交易日的暴跌中反弹，在这份意向书中，一个台湾集团承诺在未来三年内从美国购买 360 万吨谷物。【原文：Wheat futures rebounded from a slump the prior session, following the signing of a letter of intent in which a Taiwan group pledged to buy 3.6 million tons of the grain from the US over the next three years.】

item.title: 中国稀土产品出口创至少 2012 年以来新高
item.description: 在习近平与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行通话之前公布的海关数据显示，中国稀土产品的出口量在 8 月份跃升至创纪录水平。【原文：China’s exports of rare-earth products jumped to a record in August, according to customs data released ahead of an expected call between Xi Jinping and Donald Trump, which may touch on the critical materials.】

item.title: 日本支持刺激政策的高市宣布参加自民党竞选
item.description: 以支持激进的货币宽松政策和财政支出而闻名的保守强硬派高市真奈宣布，她打算参加日本执政党自民党下任领导人的竞选。【原文：Sanae Takaichi, a conservative hardliner known for supporting aggressive monetary easing and fiscal spending, declared her intention to run in the contest to become the next leader of Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party.】

item.title: 在家工作会成为合法权利吗？
item.description:
本周的彭博澳大利亚播客：克里斯-伯克（Chris Bourke）与特伦特-威尔特希尔（Trent Wiltshire）谈论澳大利亚一个州立法规定在家工作权利的计划

。【原文：

This week on the Bloomberg Australia Podcast: Chris Bourke speaks with Trent Wiltshire about an Australian state's plan to legislate work-from-home rights

】

item.title: 松下将首次推出用于机器人的新一代固态电池
item.description: 松下控股公司（Panasonic Holdings Corp. ）将在截至 2027 年 3 月的财年内首次推出一批新型固态电池样品，以开拓用于机器人和其他系统的下一代电池市场。【原文：Panasonic Holdings Corp. will debut a sample batch of its new solid-state batteries during the fiscal year ending March 2027 as it seeks to crack the next-generation batteries market for robots and other systems.】

item.title: 秘鲁国会通过新的 75 亿美元养老金提取法案
item.description: 秘鲁国会周三晚些时候通过了一项法案，允许工人从私人养老基金（主权债券的主要买家）中提取数十亿美元。【原文：Peru’s congress passed a bill late Wednesday allowing workers to withdraw billions from private pension funds, a major buyer of sovereign bonds.】

item.title: 物流供应商普洛斯准备于2026年将中国业务上市
item.description: 物流公司普洛斯私人有限公司（GLP Pte）的支持者Hopu Investment Management Co.【原文：Logistics company GLP Pte is seeking to list its China business in an initial public offering next year, said its backer Hopu Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 国际能源署预计中东电力行业用油量减少，促进原油出口
item.description: 据国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）称，中东和北非地区用于发电的石油燃烧量将急剧减少，从而释放出更多的沙特和伊拉克原油用于出口。【原文：The amount of oil burned to generate electricity in the Middle East and North Africa is set to shrink sharply, freeing up more Saudi and Iraqi crude for export, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 谷歌计划在非洲建立四个基础设施枢纽，连接最新的海底电缆
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下谷歌公司（Google）非洲总经理亚历克斯-奥科西（Alex Okosi）在接受彭博电视采访时表示，该公司正计划在非洲新建四个基础设施枢纽，以连接其为非洲大陆最新铺设的水下光缆。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is planning four new infrastructure hubs in Africa to connect its latest underwater fiber-optic cables for the continent, the company’s Africa managing director Alex Okosi said in an interview with Bloomberg TV.】

item.title: 花旗与高盛在南非利率问题上的分歧凸显了艰难的抉择
item.description: 南非储备银行自决定将通胀率锚定在 3% 以来首次召开决策者会议，经济学家们对南非储备银行是维持利率不变还是延长当前的宽松周期意见不一。【原文：Economists are divided over whether the South African Reserve Bank will keep interest rates unchanged or extend its current easing cycle when policymakers meet for the first time since deciding to anchor inflation at 3%.】

item.title: 法国预算案抗议活动加大新总理压力
item.description: 法国工会周四领导了广泛的反紧缩抗议活动，这给新上任的总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努（Sebastien Lecornu）带来了更大的压力，因为他正努力寻找盟友来拼凑预算。【原文：French unions are leading widespread anti-austerity protests Thursday, raising the pressure on newly appointed Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu as he struggles to find allies to piece together a budget.】

item.title: 英国纳税人因 Covid 初创企业拯救基金损失 4 亿英镑
item.description: 在数百家公司破产后，英国纳税人在前首相里希-苏纳克在大流行病期间发起的初创企业投资救援基金上损失了 4 亿英镑（5.47 亿美元）。【原文：UK taxpayers have lost £400 million ($547 million) on a startup investment rescue fund launched by former Prime Minister Rishi Sunak during the pandemic after hundreds of the companies went bust.】

item.title: 中国科技股因人工智能买盘和英伟达禁令尾风而飙升
item.description: 中国科技股周四攀升，其中一个关键指数创下近四年新高，原因是人工智能推动了买盘，以及监管部门对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）芯片的禁令提振了国内竞争对手的前景。【原文：Chinese tech stocks climbed Thursday, with a key index hitting a near four-year high as AI-fueled buying and a regulatory ban on an Nvidia Corp. chip boosted prospects for domestic rivals.】

item.title: 华为发布新的人工智能芯片技术，挑战英伟达的主导地位
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. unveiled its latest solution to bundle more AI chips together and boost computing power in a bid to challenge Nvidia Corp.’s technology.】

item.title: 英美资源集团因澳大利亚煤价下跌而裁员
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）正在削减澳大利亚一些炼焦煤矿的工作岗位，以保障其长期可持续发展，同时表示生产不会受到影响。【原文：Anglo American Plc is cutting jobs at some Australian coking coal mines to safeguard its long-term sustainability, while saying that production would remain unaffected.】

item.title: 发生致命骚乱后，普拉博沃将矛头指向印尼大亨
item.description:
这位前将军将目标对准了亿万富翁，排挤政治对手，并在重塑印尼经济的过程中对中央银行施加压力

。【原文：

The former general is targeting billionaires, sidelining political rivals and adding pressure on the central bank in his bid to reshape Indonesia’s economy

】

item.title: 铁矿石下滑，原因是中国消费放缓，影响了需求
item.description: 铁矿石连续第二天走低，原因是在最新数据显示政府支出放缓后，投资者对中国的需求进行了权衡。【原文：Iron ore edged lower for a second day as investors weighed Chinese demand after the latest data showed a slowdown in government spending.】
